Authorisation

By clicking on the ‘Pay now’ button, you agree that RAC Insurance can debit your nominated account for the above instalments and continue to debit your account as each instalment is due for payment, including any renewal of this policy. Please refer to the Direct Debit Service Agreement contained within the Product Disclosure Statement for important information about your direct debit request.

Payment will be debited from your nominated account or credit card within 48 hours of the initial commencement of the policy. If payment is due on a non-business day, the amount will be debited on the next business day.
By clicking on the 'Purchase now' button below you are purchasing this insurance policy online.
You acknowledge that you have read and accept RAC Insurance's

which comprise the Product Disclosure Statement, Supplementary Product Disclosure Statement, Financial Services Guide, Privacy Policy and Duty of Disclosure, which have been made available here for you to view.

A summary copy of your policy schedule will be emailed to you shortly. You will receive your detailed policy schedule in the regular mail in the next few days. If you do not receive your Policy Schedule and Product Disclosure statement by mail within 5 days please contact us. Please review the details carefully and contact us on 13 17 03 if you need to make any changes.

You will receive a copy of your policy schedule in the regular mail within the next few days. Authorisation
